clinical_study.brief_title: Tramadol for Labor Analgesia: a Placebo Controlled Randomised Control Trial
clinical_study.official_title: Tramadol for Labor Analgesia in Low Risk Women: A Placebo Controlled Randomized Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Tramadol for labor analgesia: a low risk placebo controlled randomised control trial

detailed_description.textblock: Investigators will administer 100mg tramadol or 2ml distilled water through intramuscular route in a blinded manner. Visual analogue score will be assessed in the beginning and every hour till four hours. patient satisfaction, safety outcomes, duration of 1st and 2nd stage of labor, proportion of women experiencing nausea, vomiting and increased sleepiness, postpartum haemorrhage,apgar score at 5 minute, need for nicu admission wiil be assessed at the end

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: visual analogue scale i.e scaling of severity of pain from 1 being mildest and 10 being most severe will be assessed at 2nd hour of administration

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the end of labor( within 12 hours)
secondary_outcome.description: scale of 1-5 including highly satisfied, moderately satisfied ,it is ok ,not satisfied ,highly unsatisfied
fetal tachycardia (heart rate more than 160) or fetal bradycardia (heart rate less than 100)

secondary_outcome.measure: duration of 1st and 2nd stage of labor
women with side effects like postpartum haemorrhage, nausea, vomiting and increased sleepiness
secondary_outcome.description: increased risk of postpartum haemorrhage, nausea , vomiting and sleepiness may be associated with use of tramadol

secondary_outcome.measure: neonatal safety in terms of apgar score and nicu admission
need for caesarean section or instrumental delivery
secondary_outcome.description: emergency caesarean section or need for forceps or vacuum application

arm_group.description: 50mg tramadol hydrochloride will be used intramuscularly as an experimental drug for evaluating its safety and efficacy as labor analgesic
2ml distilled water intramuscularly will be used as a placebo.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- delivering for first time(nulliparous)
- well established labor ( 3 or more contractions in a span of ten minutes
- cervical dilation of 4 cm or more
- >= 80% effacement of cervix
Exclusion Criteria:
- any medical disorder- diabetes,hypertension
- obstetric high risk factors

responsible_party.investigator_title: post graduate 1st year student obstetrics and gynecology department
